items.summary:
Black Friday is officially here, meaning it’s one of the best times to grab iPhone accessories that protect the device and improve your overall user experience. Almost every major brand is dishing out noteworthy discounts right now, and AMAZINGTHING is jumping into the holiday rush with up to a whopping 70% off iPhone accessories. The offers aren’t limited to the brand’s latest iPhone 17 lineup, and you’ll find deals on the iPhone 16 series as well, making it easy for even folks with a relatively older model to score a solid upgrade. Notably, it is also slashing prices on Nintendo Switch 2 accessories, including charging docks, carrying cases, and more. All the deals are live and ready to browse here, with more details below.

items.title: Originally $100 3-in-1 charging cube for your entire Apple kit is down to just $29 for Black Friday
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 wireless charging cube

Buy for $29 (Reg. up to $60)

Enter promo code EC3GEGKY for $8.25 off.

What we love

This compact, foldable charging station can handle your entire Apple setup at once and collapses into a tidy little cube when you’re done. It includes three dedicated wireless spots for your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch, with up to 7.5W for the iPhone and 2.5W each for the other two. It’s not the fastest charger, but the space-saving design and budget-friendly price make it worth considering, especially as a bedside solution for overnight charging.

Amazon’s official Thanksgiving Edition Black Friday sale is now in full swing and we are tracking hundreds in savings on Breville’s gorgeous espresso machines. Not only do they make delicious coffee, but, if you ask me, they also immediately elevate the look of your kitchen space with sleek brushed stainless steel in your choice of color – they are now up to $500 off too.

Malaysia will begin issuing new identity cards (ICs) starting June 2026, marking the next major refresh of the MyKad system. The upcoming version introduces enhanced security measures, including a dedicated QR code designed to help authorities digitally verify card authenticity on the spot.
